name: Murray BARSKY, D.P.M., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE
name_abbreviation: Barsky v. Commonwealth, Department of Public Welfare

judges: Larsen, J., dissents and would reach the merits of the case.
parties: Murray BARSKY, D.P.M., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
Larsen, J., dissents and would reach the merits of the case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
475 A.2d 742
Murray BARSKY, D.P.M., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE.

Argued May 16, 1984.
Decided May 25, 1984.
Gilbert B. Abramson, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Joel M. Ressler, Harrisburg, for appellee.
